paragraphs: The unconditional pop icon of Ukrainian pop music, Irina Bilyk, will give a concert in Prague. It will take place on November 24th at the Divadlo Broadway theater in the city center (Na Příkopě 988/31, Prague 1).
👉 Tickets can be purchased through this link.

Throughout her long creative journey, the singer has achieved all possible music awards. She collaborated with many Ukrainian stars, participated in top TV shows, and played to sold-out crowds at concerts in Ukraine and beyond.

Irina Bilyk's songs are probably in the playlist of any fan of quality Ukrainian pop music. Because for every happy or sad moment in life, you can choose one of the singer's tracks: "Tak Prosto" (So Simple), "Kraski" (Colors), "Molchat" (Be Silent), "Sneg" (Snow), "Ne Sprashivay" (Don't Ask), and many others.
Every concert of Irina Bilyk is a warm atmosphere, well-thought-out performances, and a sea of pleasant memories. Don't miss this grand event!
At the Prague concert, the singer will present a new concert program called "55".
❗️❗️Subscribe to our Telegram channel by following the link: t.me/vinegret_cz
